name: Web Spiders (India) Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
Web Spiders is a global outsourcing provider of Rich Internet Application (RIA) development services and Systems Integration services for Enterprise Content Management to Corporations and Independent Software Vendors (ISVs) in more than 10 countries.

With its Offshore Delivery Centers in India and proximity centers in Europe and America, it bridges the offshore-onsite gap for its customers to achieve lower cost of ownership, reduce risk and accelerate ‘go-to-market’ for their projects and products.

Web Spiders’ services include Enterprise-scale Application Development on Flex, Silverlight, AJAX and Systems Integration services for 3rd party products in the areas of Web content & Document management (e.g. Interwoven, Ektron and Open Source) , Enterprise Blogging (WordPress, Movable Type) and Enterprise Wiki and Collaboration (e.g. MS SharePoint).

We have in-depth domain expertise in:

Enterprise 2.0 Technology: RIA Development using Flex/ AJAX/ Silverlight/ AIR, Search Engine Optimization, RSS, Enterprise Wikis/ Blogging.

e-Learning: Learning Management and Authoring Tools, Custom Content and Rich Media Development, SCORM and Standards Compliance.

Financial Services: Specialization in Investment Management and Insurance.

Automotive & Manufacturing: Content and Document Management, e-Business and Supply Chain Automation.

Healthcare: Product Development for Clinic, Hospital Management, e-Health and HIPAA compliance.
